title: Adjust Reservoir Release for Flood Control
description: Heavy rain is forecasted, and a reservoir is already near full capacity. An operator must proactively release water to create storage capacity and prevent downstream flooding.

tasks.description: Receive a weather alert for heavy rainfall and check the current level of the 'Northwood Reservoir'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the reservoir is at 95% capacity, which is a risk.

tasks.description: Calculate the required outflow rate to lower the reservoir level by 10% over the next 12 hours without causing flooding downstream.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system calculates a safe release rate.

tasks.description: Remotely open the reservoir's sluice gate to the calculated position to begin the controlled release.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully operates the dam's gate.
